entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
